body: Taihou is great girl shame Kancolle is not good enough for me to keep playing anymore I have so many good memories with this game but it's just life. Talking about events I cleared whole Summer '15 last map on Easy but there were lots of people who didn't do it and I must say Myoukou-class was my MVP back then because of them I did well in most stages. I still have hope that maybe in future it will be worth to play again Kancolle but sadly I doubt it they would need to change game a lot and they wont do it.
I came too much inside her
